products.title: Valencia Simplicity Red Vertical Blind
products.description: This red vertical blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour. Think of a post box but much brighter. Red is for passion and there's no mistaking the raciness of this blind. Red is a popular accent colour in kitchens and studies, this may just be what you've been looking fo this red vertical blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour.

products.title: Sevilla Vivid Red Vertical Blind
products.description: Bright, bold and beautiful, this vibrant sevilla vivid red vertical blind is the perfect way to add a flash of colour to your home. It will match with other berry tones as well as being the perfect foil for whites, creams and even orange.
